changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on GTM (Google Tag Manager) tracking improvements across Factor Form and OTP (One-Time Purchase) flows, along with several bug fixes for cart pricing and UI elements. Additional work includes Shopify redirect logic cleanup, portion percentage calculations for pet feeding plans, and various refactoring efforts around group/grooming rewrites and payment API optimization.

features.name: Factor Form Multi-Cadence GTM Events
features.description: Updated GTM event tracking for multi-cadence options in Factor Form

features.name: OTP Funnel Step Tracking
features.description: Added funnel step tracking for One-Time Purchase flow in Factor Form

features.name: Payment Step Completed GTM Event
features.description: Adds GTM event tracking when payment step is completed for OTP

features.name: Shopify Redirect for Net New Customers
features.description: Enables redirect for new customers to Shopify FactorForm and updates canonical URLs

features.name: Learn More Link and Modal
features.description: Added Learn More link with scaffolded modal implementation

features.name: Plan Switcher Dropdown
features.description: Added dropdown component for plan switching functionality

features.name: Dynamic Portion % Options
features.description: Display portion percentage options based on FeedingPlanType answer

features.name: Box Model Builder
features.description: Implemented useThePetsTableBoxContent for Box Model Builder

decisions.what: Eliminate dead logic for Shopify redirects
decisions.rationale: Remove unused/obsolete redirect code to clean up codebase

decisions.what: Update adjust calories to use new portion options behind feature flag
decisions.rationale: Gradual rollout of new portion calculation logic with feature flag control

decisions.what: Change position of breed message card
decisions.rationale: UI/UX improvement for better user flow
Performance optimization to eliminate redundant API requests

refactors.reason: Update test snapshots after grooming code refactoring
Remove dead code and simplify redirect handling
refactors.impact: Customer onboarding flow for Shopify integration

fixes.issue: Place Order CTA bug related to feature flag
Portion % default value when entering change plans

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Multiple GTM tracking updates and OTP flow enhancements

entities.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase)
entities.context: New funnel tracking and payment completion events added

entities.name: Shopify
entities.context: Redirect logic cleanup and net new customer routing enabled

entities.name: GTM (Google Tag Manager)
entities.context: Extensive tracking improvements across multiple flows

entities.name: Payment Component

entities.name: Box Model Builder

key_patterns: Feature flag driven development for gradual rollout of new functionality
Extensive GTM event tracking implementation across user flows for analytics
Performance optimization through elimination of duplicate API calls
Ticket-driven development with clear Jira references (RTEVMS, MIO, GOC, TPT prefixes)
Separation of concerns between OTP and subscription flows
Progressive enhancement with feature flags for portion calculation logic
